kentauros.package package¶

Module contents¶

kentauros.package module base data structures containing information about and methods for packages

class kentauros.package.Package(name)[source]¶

Bases: object

kentauros.package.Package: class that holds information about packages. at the moment, this only includes package name and the ConfigParser object

update_config()[source]¶

method that writes package configuration out to $NAME.conf in CONFDIR

exception kentauros.package.PackageError(value)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

kentauros.package.PackageError: exception class for package information parsing errors
